mapper.select: SELECT suggest_no as BOARDNO, 'suggest' as CATEGORY, suggest_title as TITLE, suggest_content as CONTENT, TO_CHAR(suggest_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(suggest_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ENDDATE, NVL(HIT_COUNT, 0) as HITCOUNT, NVL("COMMENTS", 0) as COMMENTCOUNT, NVL("HEARTS", 0) as HEARTCOUNT, 'none' as THUMBNAIL FROM ( SELECT * FROM SUGGESTION LEFT JOIN SUGGEST_HITS ON (SUGGESTION.suggest_no = SUGGEST_HITS.board_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT suggest_no, COUNT(*) AS "COMMENTS" FROM SUGGEST_COMMENT GROUP BY suggest_no) USING (suggest_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT suggest_no, COUNT(*) AS "HEARTS" FROM SUGGEST_COMMENT WHERE comment_heart = 'Y' GROUP BY suggest_no) USING (suggest_no) WHERE suggest_del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY suggest_date DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND #{_parameter}

SELECT discuss_no as BOARDNO, 'discussion' as CATEGORY, discuss_title as TITLE, discuss_content as CONTENT, TO_CHAR(discuss_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(discuss_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ENDDATE, NVL(HIT_COUNT, 0) as HITCOUNT, NVL("COMMENTS", 0) as COMMENTCOUNT, '0' as HEARTCOUNT, discuss_thumbnail_path as THUMBNAIL FROM ( SELECT * FROM DISCUSSION LEFT JOIN DISCUSSION_HITS ON (DISCUSSION.discuss_no = DISCUSSION_HITS.board_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT discuss_no, COUNT(*) AS "COMMENTS" FROM DISCUSS_COMMENT GROUP BY discuss_no) USING (discuss_no) WHERE discuss_del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY discuss_date DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND #{_parameter}

SELECT proposal_no as BOARDNO, 'survey' as CATEGORY, proposal_title as TITLE, proposal_content as CONTENT, TO_CHAR(proposal_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(proposal_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ENDDATE, NVL(HIT_COUNT, 0) as HITCOUNT, NVL("COMMENTS", 0) as COMMENTCOUNT, '0' as HEARTCOUNT, proposal_thumbnail_path as THUMBNAIL FROM ( SELECT * FROM PROPOSAL LEFT JOIN PROPOSAL_HITS ON (PROPOSAL.proposal_no = PROPOSAL_HITS.board_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT proposal_no, COUNT(*) AS "COMMENTS" FROM PROPOSAL_COMMENT GROUP BY proposal_no) USING (proposal_no) WHERE proposal_del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY proposal_date DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND #{_parameter}
